Tyrael sighed, as if agreeing to give in to a child's caprice.

Tyrael: All right, but take it outside. And leave each other
functional. I'll continue with our plans just after.

He goes just at the base's entrance and waits for the two warriors. He
wants to know how Deathsteel fights so as to better use him afterwards.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> DeathSteel:
> 
> He lookes at Kaiser and grins slightly.  He can smell a test of metal 
> a mile away. He stood up and nodded to Tyrael.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Kaiser::
> >        He smirks inwardly at this new warrior.  Yes, adequate suits 
> him. But 
> > he likes it not.  Methinks, perhaps, he needs a lesson.  He grins 
> again and 
> > looks over to Major Tyrael.  "He seems dissatisfied with my 
> compliment, 
> > Major."  He gestures at Deathsteel with one hand.  "May I?"
